roleset.name: call for, require, justify

example.name: transitive, almost always
example.text: He said construction wouldn't resume until market conditions warrant it.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'warrant' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'warranted' based on BOLT-2,3. Comparison to 'justify'. No Vncls.

example.name: adjectival rel: warranted
example.text: Such disapproval may be certainly warranted - and I disapprove of it generally - but what one must go through -LRB- mentally , emotionally and / or experiencially -RRB- can hardly be called " easy " .
